long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to control MahjongSoul using keyboard shortcuts. You can select and discard tiles using [ctrl + F], [ctrl + B], and [Enter].

Currently, only tile selection and discarding are supported, but in the future, you'll be able to choose calls.

Note: To function properly, you need to run this program on your PC: https://github.com/KantaHasegawa/mahjong-soul-keyboard-backend.
